name: Black Panther

abilities.name: Vibranium Claws
abilities.details: Performs a combo of quick melee strikes.

abilities.name: Kinetic Slash
abilities.details: Releases stored kinetic energy. Damage depends on charge level shown on UI.

abilities.name: Panther's Leap
abilities.details: Leaps forward. Can target enemies to pounce on them, dealing damage.

ultimate.name: Bast's Fury
ultimate.effect: Increases attack speed, movement speed, and grants lifesteal on attacks for ~8 seconds.
ultimate.details: Channels the power of the Panther God Bast, entering an empowered state.

passives.name: Vibranium Suit
passives.details: Stores kinetic energy (up to 100) when taking damage or dealing damage. Reduces incoming damage slightly.

teamups.effect: Bast's Fury also grants Storm a movement speed buff if nearby.

lore: T'Challa, the king of the technologically advanced African nation Wakanda. His powers are granted by the heart-shaped herb and his mastery of the Vibranium suit, making him a formidable warrior and strategist.

comics.title: Black Panther (various series, particularly by Priest, Coates)
